short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download Merch by Amazon designs with one click button. Perfect for designers, pod sellers and advertisers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MerchBuddy Lite is a browser extension that allows you to download designs from Merch by Amazon with just one click. The extension automatically identifies the product design and provides high-quality files, saving you time in storing and using images.

Why should you install this extension?

Quick and Convenient: Download product designs from Merch by Amazon with a single click.
Automatic Design Recognition: No need for manual searching; the extension automatically selects the right quality images.
Optimized for Designers and Advertisers: Perfect for print-on-demand (POD) sellers looking to efficiently store and utilize designs for their projects and advertising campaigns.
Who is it for?

Fashion designers, advertisers, and any seller in the print-on-demand space needing a quick way to download designs from Merch by Amazon.
Install now to experience the convenience!
